dcterms:description: AISHELL-1 is an open-source Mandarin speech corpus that contains 178 hours of audio data, designed for automatic speech recognition tasks. The dataset includes a vocabulary of 4230 Chinese characters and four special tokens.
dcterms:title: AISHELL-1
